summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via updates to global CSS theme tokens (including primary/ring/sidebar and custom logo/outline styles) and PWA/browser theme metadata colors. Two additional modified files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) are not part of the requested changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added extensive project-wide change summaries unrelated to the requested theme color change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for theme color updates in CSS and PWA metadata; modifying a repository summary file is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata (e.g., new_feature_requests entries) unrelated to implementing the theme change itself.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project_state.json or any project management metadata.
